extendedInfo.description: The sequel to the critically acclaimed âAnomaly Warzone Earthâ!The alien robots are back and this time theyâve got Korea in their sights. Itâs your job to lead a squad into fierce fire-fights and fend off the alien invasion. Plan your routes carefully and use new units and powers to turn the tide of war against a horde of new enemy threats. This isnât tower defense itâs tower offense! AWARD-WINNING GAMEPLAY Flipping the tower defense genre on its head, you play the invaders leading your unit into alien-infested districts. Plan carefully, use your money and powers wisely, and make it through unscathed. A NEW WAY TO PLAY Keep an eye on the action from a top-down perspective and use tactile touch controls to assemble your squad, plan your route using the new tactical map and simply execute player powers such as Boost, which speeds up your unitâs offense. Test your leadership abilities in the new âArt of Warâ trials. CUTTING-EDGE PRESENTATION This thrilling portable strategy game comes to life in stunning detail on your device with stunning high-definition visuals and attention to detail. Anomaly Korea delivers an atmospheric soundtrack and full voice acting â this is console gameplay on a portable device. Game Features: â¢A sequel to the award-winning Anomaly Warzone Earth â¢Think tactically across 12 new missions â¢Deploy new player powers and units to take on new enemies â¢Put your skills to the test in âArt of Warâ mode â¢Cutting-edge visuals and a stunning soundtrack with full voice acting â¢Optimised for best Android devicesFor more information or support, please visit www.anomalykorea.com"

reviews.title: Truly Excellent Game
reviews.comment: Excellent graphics, excellent gameplay, excellent controls, a perfect game, i really cant fault it ( except maybe i need more levels! ) Could use GPGS support though
reviews.author: Fionn O\' Reilly

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good graphics but you need to fix the mission loading screen bug then after I play I\'ll up the stars
reviews.author: Matthew Hamm

reviews.title: Anomaly China?
reviews.comment: A game to play once or twice.  The music and the Chinese accent for Park were unbearable.
reviews.author: Bada Kim

reviews.title: Excellent game!!
reviews.comment: Nice graphics! Nice gameplay. Great concept where youre the attacker in a tower defense set up.
reviews.author: Werner A

reviews.title: Very nice! Great graphics and game play.
reviews.comment: A reverse tower game as mentioned, where you are the offensive party now instead of defending. Interesting game play and pretty fun!
reviews.author: Samson Ong

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Nice gameplay, more of the good stuff from previous one.
reviews.author: Pawel Ksiazek

reviews.title: Different
reviews.comment: Different way to the defense type gaming! Very very well made! Graphics, sound and interface perfects! Nice work.
reviews.author: Alexandre Pinto

reviews.title: Not working on my Xperia Z Ultra!
reviews.comment: Was working fine on my Asus PadFone Android 4.1.2. Is it not compatible with Android 4.2.2?
reviews.author: Habibullah Habib

reviews.title: Excelent game
reviews.comment: I own Anomaly 1 and 2 on steam, and I own both Anomalies on Android. Game has great concept with reversed tower defense, great graphics and great sound. I hope you guys will make Anomaly 2 for android as well. More missions pls :)
reviews.author: Neven Klofutar

reviews.title: Good but so short!
reviews.comment: Really good game, but it is a shame it is so short. Twice as many levels would\'ve been nice. I would\'ve paid a bit more for that. I\'m disappointed I finished the game in a few short hours.  Oh.. and a fake Korean accent that sounds terrible? Come on guys...
reviews.author: Andrew Taft

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This whole app is perfect. The visuals are truly incredible, console quality. The story is good, which isn\'t common in mobile games. Even the way the screen moves when you look around feels polished and smooth, clean. I have to emphasize how amazing the graphics are. It\'s like looking at helicopter video. And you really do have strategic control, like route changing, vehicle line up, various boosts, etc. Definitely a must-buy. And the reverse TD is a great concept.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the price, and quite fun
reviews.comment: A twist on Tower Defense games where you\'re avoiding the enemy instead of engaging him head on. You drop items in real time to defend your convoy until it reaches it\'s goal. The graphics are incredible considering the simplistic game play. Definitely worth the price if you\'re a Tower Defense fan.
reviews.author: Matt Eslinger

reviews.title: Captive gameplay and well set out difficulty
reviews.comment: The game was fun to play and the added option of choosing each missions difficulty was a neat feature! Definitely gonna more play for a few days!
reviews.author: Marco Smith

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: If you could just speed up the narration/explaination at the beginning of the levels. The first and maybe the second time I was ok with it, but I\'ve played multiple levels of difficulty and it gets tiresome. A straight to play feature would be great.
reviews.author: Kris Everette

reviews.title: good concept but...
reviews.comment: TF201.... first level ok, stuck loading the 2nd, waited ages, will not load, i hear music but there is no video. Played the original on apple devices, great concept pity it hasn\'t transfered to android
reviews.author: Daniel Moulden

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Works perfect and has great graphics.. can\'t wait until the next release, if any :D
reviews.author: Jeroen Joosten

reviews.title: Wroth the time and money..
reviews.comment: This game is simply awesome.! Graphics are mind blowing!
reviews.author: Pratik Makadia

reviews.title: Nice game but...
reviews.comment: Update to have functionality with Google play games, maybe?
reviews.author: Maxx Tan

reviews.title: Xperia z
reviews.comment: Great game and runs fine on the z :-)
reviews.author: andrew hayes

reviews.title: Awesome tower offense action!
reviews.comment: But just 4 stars for being so short. Wish it had twice as many levels. :-)
reviews.author: Francis Michael Depalco
